title: Interview with Dr. Bethany Robertson
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr Bethany Robertson from The University of York about her research on gender identities of women in farming. Bethany discusses how she has interviewed many women working in the farming industry and some of their experiences of this.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
